item.description:
Time to walk Crane's Beach and enjoy the wide open spaces of this wonderful barrier beach system - optional lunch stop to refuel at Stone Soup afterwards. Plan on a 3 hour walk with some mildly hilly sandy dune paths. Let's try for Sunday instead as Saturday's weather is not too inviting.

No dogs as we'll do a loop back through the dunes and dogs are strictly verboten in the dunes.

It costs $5 per car at Crane's Beach (less if you are a member of TTOR). If a few people prefer to carpool, you can meet at Ipswich MBTA station and figure out who wants to drive. Please let me know if you want to do this. I will go straight to the parking lot at Crane's Beach and meet you there.

We will leave on time! $1 per person please to help cover my Meetup fees.

Bad weather cancels - I'll send you my phone number so you can call me if not sure.

NOTE: I limit the numbers on my walks deliberately to reduce the impact on this amazing natural resource - so please be considerate and don't sign up unless you are really coming!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in parking lot at Crane's Beach at 10AM sharp OR at 9.30 AM at Ipswich MBTA station to carpool

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Crane's Beach Walk POSTPONED UNTIL SUNDAY
